channel.title: How do you add a Trade function to an NPC?
channel.description: I want to make an NPC a shop owner, and I have done everything so that I can use the shop (such as added the items), but when I tried to open the shop, I right clicked and there was no TRADE button, how do I add one? [br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 08:17:43 AM[/size][hr]I have very little patience people...[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 08:29:01 AM[/size][hr][u][b]OH COME ON![/b][/u]

item.title: How do you add a Trade function to an NPC?

item.title: How do you add a Trade function to an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Search for this aswell;

else if (NPCID == 1305) { // Agnar Food Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; //Aubury Magic Shop }

Then copy it, paste it underneath the last brace and then fill in you’re information. Like, change the NPC ID and change the WanneShop number.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you add a Trade function to an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

search for this

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop
under that last } add this

} else if (NPCID == ####) { //shop npc name here PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = #shop number#; //shop name here

metal

hope this helps ya

Read full topic
